name: YouTube - Flat Design Input Light Theme
description:
This input is only good for Youtube Light Theme.
Dark Theme Link - https://userstyles.org/styles/163081/youtube-flat-design-input-dark-theme
ATTENTION: There has been a cool color update go to line: 6 to change the color ;)

user.name: X_XMarshy
user.about: I make boring websites look modern with Flat Design.

additional_info: New release note: Man this site sure is... BOUNCY! The YouTube logo and every icon now has a fancy new bounce animation to them! Also the videos thumbnails have a nice cozy zoom on them when you hover! ATTENTION: There has been a cool color update go to line: 6 to change the color ;)

discussions.name: I swear to god if someone post something like "how does it work?" then LOOK AT THIS: GO TO LINE 6!
